v.v: Look, Yahweh is about to empty the earth, to devastate it, mar its surface, and scatter its inhabitants.
It will come about that, as with the people, so with the priest;
The earth will be completely devastated and completely stripped;
The earth dries up and withers, the world shrivels up and fades away,
The earth is polluted by its inhabitants
Therefore a curse devours the earth, and its inhabitants are found guilty.
The new wine dries up, the vine withers, all the merry-hearted groan.
The happy sound of the tambourines stops, and the revelry of those who rejoice;
They no longer drink wine and sing, and the beer is bitter to those who drink it.
The city of chaos has been broken down; every house is closed up and empty.
There is a crying in the streets because of the wine;
In the city is left a desolation, and the gate is broken into a ruin.
For this is how it will be on the whole earth among the nations,

v: as with the servant, so with his master;
as with the maid, so with her mistress;
as with the buyer, so with the seller;
as with the creditor, so with the debtor;
as with the receiver of interest, so with the giver of interest.
for Yahweh has spoken this word.
the prominent people of the earth waste away.
because they have transgressed the laws, violated the statutes,
and broken the everlasting covenant.
The inhabitants of the earth burn up, and few people are left.
the joy of the lyre ceases.
all joy is darkened, the gladness of the land has disappeared.
as when an olive tree is beaten, as the gleanings when the grape harvest is done.

v.v: They will lift up their voices and shout the majesty of Yahweh,
Therefore in the east glorify Yahweh,
From the farthest part of the earth we have heard songs,
Terror, the pit, and the snare are upon you, inhabitants of the earth.
He who flees from the sound of terror will fall into the pit,
The earth will be completely broken, the earth ripped apart;
The earth will stagger like a drunken man and it will sway back and forth like a hut.

v: and will joyfully shout from the sea.
and in the isles of the sea give glory to the name of Yahweh, the God of Israel.
“Glory to the righteous one!”
But I said, “I have wasted away, I have wasted away, woe is me!
The treacherous have dealt treacherously;
yes, the treacherous have dealt very treacherously.”
and he who comes up out of the middle of the pit will be caught in the snare.
The windows of the heavens will be opened, and the foundations of the earth will shake.
the earth will be violently shaken.
Its sin will be heavy on it and it will fall and never rise again.

v.v: On that day Yahweh will punish the host of the heaven in the heavens,
They will be gathered together, prisoners in a pit,
Then the moon will be ashamed, and the sun disgraced,

v: and the kings of the earth on the earth.
and will be shut up in a prison;
and after many days they will be punished.
for Yahweh of hosts will reign on Mount Zion and in Jerusalem,
and before his elders in glory.
